DOC.brief_summary: This randomize clinical trial evaluate addition long-acting reversible contraception ( LARC ) focus video-counseling prenatal care increase uptake postpartum LARC .
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible participant identify prenatal period randomize one two group . The control group receive standard care contraceptive counseling prenatal counseling . The intervention group also receive standard care contraceptive counseling prenatal care , also watch evidence-based,12 minute LARC First video create CHOICE project provide information different contraceptive method . All participant receive information regard access free LARC method postpartum period . All participant call 12 week postpartum . Independent randomization arm , undergo 5-minute survey phone contraceptive method choice use .
DOC.criteria: woman present routine prenatal care visit University North Carolina ( UNC ) Resident Continuity Clinic least 18 year old fluent English able read thirdgrade read level plan sterilization postpartum contraception least 28 week gestation time enrollment meet previously outline inclusion criterion unable provide inform consent .
